That sounds a lot like you're talking about the HUD feature of VOID. Check the VOID configuration dialogue (the parabola icon in the toolbar), which should have a button to reset the HUD positions, as well buttons to enable or disable the HUD.

Can you provide a list of all the mods you have installed (basically a list of the folders inside the GameData folder)? Both VOID and KER 1.0 have "windowless" HUDs and there are other mods too.
VOID and Kerbal Engineer both have HUD data display. They have windows as well.

The screenshot in the OP of the VOID thread doesn't show how it looks in flight all that well, it's easy to focus on all the settings windows and miss the green text by the altimeter at the top of the screen. Normally, the green text is all that's visible.

Kerbal Engineer is my preferred info mod (and it just updated today with better maneuver node info than stock, among other things), but others like MechJeb, VOID or FlightInfo (or possibly others).
